Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/35th
ShortDescription: NB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via: California, 35th, Western, 31st and California, due to, street blockage, near California/35th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via: California, 35th, Western, 31st and California, due to, street blockage, near California/35th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
